translation.You cannot add yourself, try another e-m: You cannot add yourself, try another e-mail address.
translation.No user was found, try a different e-mai: No user was found, try a different e-mail address.
Look for a user to chat.
You have not started any group chat.

translation.You cannot add yourself, try another e-m: No te puedes agregar a ti mismo, intenta con otra dirección de correo electrónico.
translation.No user was found, try a different e-mai: No se encontró ningún usuario, prueba con otra dirección de correo.
No has empezado ningún chat grupal.

translation.You cannot add yourself, try another e-m: Vous ne pouvez pas vous ajouter, essayez une autre adresse e-mail.
translation.No user was found, try a different e-mai: Aucun utilisateur trouvé, essayez une autre adresse e-mail.
